root.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW V_ACC_AMORTIZE_PAY_MAIN AS SELECT INFO.GROUP_ID, INFO.HOS_ID, INFO.COPY_CODE, INFO.APPLY_CODE AS BUSINESS_ID, INFO.APPLY_CODE AS BUSINESS_NO, INFO.TYPE_CODE, ATYPE.TYPE_NAME, INFO.ORIGINAL_APPLY_CODE, INFO.APPLY_NAME, INFO.PACT_CODE, INFO.AMORTIZE_YEAR, INFO.AMORTIZED, INFO.ORIGIN_VALUE, INFO.AMORTIZED_VALUE, INFO.NET_VALUE, INFO.SUP_ID, SUP.SUP_NAME, INFO.NOTE, INFO.USER_ID, INFO.APPLY_DATE AS BUSI_DATE FROM ACC_AMORTIZE_INFO INFO LEFT JOIN ACC_AMORTIZE_TYPE ATYPE ON INFO.GROUP_ID = ATYPE.GROUP_ID AND INFO.HOS_ID = ATYPE.HOS_ID AND INFO.COPY_CODE = ATYPE.COPY_CODE AND INFO.TYPE_CODE = ATYPE.TYPE_CODE LEFT JOIN HOS_SUP_DICT SUP ON INFO.GROUP_ID = SUP.GROUP_ID AND INFO.HOS_ID = SUP.HOS_ID AND INFO.SUP_ID = SUP.SUP_ID

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW V_ACC_AMORTIZE_MAIN AS SELECT HISTORY.GROUP_ID, HISTORY.HOS_ID, HISTORY.COPY_CODE, HISTORY.HISTORY_CODE AS BUSINESS_ID, HISTORY.HISTORY_CODE AS BUSINESS_NO, HISTORY.APPLY_CODE, HISTORY.YEAR, HISTORY.MONTH, HISTORY.AMORTIZED, HISTORY.DEPT_ID, DEPT.DEPT_CODE, DEPT.DEPT_NAME, HISTORY.SOURCE_ID, s.SOURCE_CODE, s.SOURCE_NAME, HISTORY.THIS_AMORTIZED, HISTORY.ALL_AMORTIZED, HISTORY.USER_ID, HISTORY.AMORTIZED_DATE AS BUSI_DATE, ATYPE.TYPE_CODE, ATYPE.TYPE_NAME, INFO.ORIGIN_VALUE, SOURCE.MONEY FROM ACC_AMORTIZED_HISTORY HISTORY LEFT JOIN ACC_AMORTIZE_INFO INFO ON HISTORY.GROUP_ID = INFO.GROUP_ID AND HISTORY.HOS_ID = INFO.HOS_ID AND HISTORY.COPY_CODE = INFO.COPY_CODE AND HISTORY.APPLY_CODE = INFO.APPLY_CODE LEFT JOIN ACC_AMORTIZE_TYPE ATYPE ON HISTORY.GROUP_ID = ATYPE.GROUP_ID AND HISTORY.HOS_ID = ATYPE.HOS_ID AND HISTORY.COPY_CODE = ATYPE.COPY_CODE AND INFO.TYPE_CODE = ATYPE.TYPE_CODE LEFT JOIN ACC_AMORTIZE_SOURCE SOURCE ON HISTORY.GROUP_ID = SOURCE.GROUP_ID AND HISTORY.HOS_ID = SOURCE.HOS_ID AND HISTORY.COPY_CODE = SOURCE.COPY_CODE AND HISTORY.SOURCE_ID = SOURCE.SOURCE_ID AND HISTORY.APPLY_CODE = SOURCE.APPLY_CODE LEFT JOIN HOS_DEPT_DICT DEPT ON HISTORY.GROUP_ID = DEPT.GROUP_ID AND HISTORY.HOS_ID = DEPT.HOS_ID AND HISTORY.DEPT_ID = DEPT.DEPT_ID AND DEPT.IS_STOP = 0 LEFT JOIN HOS_SOURCE S ON HISTORY.GROUP_ID = s.GROUP_ID AND HISTORY.HOS_ID = s.HOS_ID AND HISTORY.SOURCE_ID = s.SOURCE_ID
